name: Languages Hub in Notion
description: Feeling lost in your language learning journey? The Languages Hub will definitely be your new best friend for planning your study sessions and keeping track of your language goals!What you can find:Aesthetic languages galleryGoal trackerBreak down your goals into actionable steps with the plannerReview your week of studies to evaluate your language experienceFor any doubt, please contact me via DM on Instagram or watch the tutorial available on my YouTube channel!
features: Aesthetic languages gallery; Goal tracker; Break down your goals into actionable steps with the planner; Review your week of studies to evaluate your language experience
